scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && ghpages -p .ghpages && shx rm -rf .ghpages
scripts.deploykevin: cp ~/Code/superserver/indexer/files/sites.json src && npm run deploy && git add . && git commit -m 'Updates'
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && shx mkdir -p .ghpages && shx cp -r index.html CNAME css js img .ghpages
